name: Windows Gather Active Directory Managed Groups
author: Stuart Morgan <stuart.morgan@mwrinfosecurity.com>
description:
This module will enumerate AD groups on the specified domain which are specifically managed.
        It cannot at the moment identify whether the 'Manager can update membership list' option
        option set; if so, it would allow that member to update the contents of that group. This
        could either be used as a persistence mechanism (for example, set your user as the 'Domain
        Admins' group manager) or could be used to detect privilege escalation opportunities
        without having domain admin privileges.

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: DOMAIN
options.description: The domain to query or distinguished name (e.g. DC=test,DC=com)

options.name: MAX_SEARCH
options.description: Maximum values to retrieve, 0 for all.

options.name: ADDITIONAL_FIELDS
options.description: Additional group fields to retrieve, comma separated.

options.name: RESOLVE_MANAGERS
options.description: Query LDAP to get the account name of group managers.
